rejectionReason: Redundant - PATHFINDER-2 data already in database

clinicalEvidence.findings: Galleri Multi-Cancer Early Detection Blood Test increased cancer detection more than seven-fold when added to USPSTF A and B recommended screenings. More than half of cancers detected by Galleri were early stage. Approximately three-quarters of Galleri-detected cancers do not have recommended screenings.
